## setLogger() function

Sets custom logger.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function setLogger(logger: Logger): Logger;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  logger | [Logger](./influxdb-client.logger.md) | logger to use |
